tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Excellent work with reasonable fees! Absolutely a great dentist!
I highly recommend visiting this clinic.
Dr Muzakkir  is one of the best dentists I have ever had. He is very gentle, professional and explains very clearly about the problem as well as the solution.His treatment and service is also excellent - I am delighted with the results.

tags: None
review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Crown Dental Care for some dental work, including fillings and tooth caps, with Dr. Muzakkir. I was thoroughly impressed with the quality of care and attention to detail that he provided.

First and foremost, Dr. Muzakkir is an extremely skilled dentist who clearly takes pride in his work. He was attentive to my concerns and took the time to explain the procedures to me in detail, which helped me feel comfortable and confident in his abilities.

The fillings and tooth caps that Dr. Muzakkir placed are not only functional, but they also look incredibly natural. I was amazed at how seamlessly they blended in with the rest of my teeth.

The clinic itself - Crown Dental Care - is clean, modern, and well-equipped with the latest dental technology.

Overall, I would highly recommend Crown Dental Care and Dr.Muzakkir to anyone in need of dental care. He is an exceptional dentist who truly cares about his patients and strives to provide the best possible care. Thank you for a great experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Smile Design,Zirconia Crowns,
review:
Good care and efficient treatment plan by Dr Syed Muzakkir for my smile designing with zirconia crowns. Extremely happy with the treatment outcome and really satisfied.
Advice everyone to go for treatment at LuxCare Dental hospital for dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Straightening,Presurgical Orthodontics,Metal Braces Fixing,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
I got to know about crown dental care from one of my friend who was an old patient of Dr Syed Muzakkir.
I was having issues with my teeth alignment because of which I wasn't able to maintain oral hygiene also I had social anxiety.
On my friend suggestion I visited crown dental for consultation.
Dr Muzakkir did my dental check up and explained me the issues that I was suffering from and also proposed the treatment plan and discourse of treatment.
It's been 10 months now and I have completed orthodontic treatment at crown dental care and all my alignment issues have been corrected and now I am able to brush properly.
Special thanks to Dr Khadeer who has taken care of my braces treatment and made my braces journey smooth and easy üòá****** ****** ******** ***
I highly recommend crown dental to anyone looking for dental treatments and solutions üëçüòá

tags: None
review:
I have Done with my teeth implantation in crown dental care.
Syed sir was professionally expert in dental related issues..
My treatment was really good and I am experiencing  no issues with my teeth now.
it was very comfortable iam happy with my treatment now.
Experience was good and professional manner, i recommend to take treatment here..

Iam really thankful to the Syed sir and staff was really supporting, to patients..

Please reach out if you have any dental related issues.

Thanks to crown dental careüëç

I have gone through the RCT and wisdom tooth extraction procedure. IlDoctor has given a very smooth and clear instructions before starting the treatment to make me feel comfortable.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Checkup (General),
review: Very humble doctor who patiently hear all our problems and concerns then explain the cause and treatment plan. Consultation fee and treatment charges are very low compared to other corporate dental hospitals. During the procedure also he makes sure that we are comfortable by frequently asking about any pain and discomfort. I got five root canal and seven teeth caps and I am relieved from teeth pain that I had since months. Recommended to everyone who are looking for good dentist for there treatment.

review: I want to thank Dr syed muzakir sir for giving a good treatment for me. Everyone used to say me that dental treatment is very painful we can't bear that pain.but dr. Syed muzakir sir had done me treatment without any pain. I did not got any pain.1) He is a specialist in giving treatment without any pain.2) He is humble person who listens our problem carefully. 3) His treatment is perfect . . Last think I have to say that he completed my treatment without any pain. Thank you Dr syed muzakir sir for giving my excellent treatment. I kindly suggest everyone to visit him and his clinic crown dental care located at attapur maruthinagar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Muzakkir was very professional and patiently listened to all complaints and suggested a very detailed plan of treatment in a comprehensible way. Also, he followed up with a call after 2 days of treatment to check if everything is alright. (Something which we rarely see doctors doing nowadays). Highly recommended this clinic for all dental care.
